text:
Legalcom | Writers, SEO | Contract, full-time | Remote

Legalcom is building the next generation of legal services for customers. We are fully remote and looking to grow our content team:

- Writers. We're looking for writers to help us educate our customers. Legal related experience (ie. paralegal) is a plus, but it's not a requirement. We're not writing academic papers.

- SEO. We're looking for a full-time SEO person to manage our websites and help us grow our content and SEO rankings.

Email us at office@legalcom.group to apply.
